simple_counter.boilerplate:
count=0

def increment():
    global count
    count+=1
    return count

def decrement():
    global count
    count-=1
    return count
simple_counter.test:
def test_counter():
    global count
    count=0
    increment()
    assert count==1
    decrement()
    assert count==0
